Package villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerChatUI

Klasse VillagerTalkScrollableChatWidget

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ClickableWidget
net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ScrollableWidget
villagertalk.villagertalk.VillagerChatUI.VillagerTalkScrollableChatWidget
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
net.minecraft.client.gui.Drawable, net.minecraft.client.gui.Element, net.minecraft.client.gui.Narratable, net.minecraft.client.gui.navigation.Navigable, net.minecraft.client.gui.Selectable, net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.Widget
public class VillagerTalkScrollableChatWidget extends net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ScrollableWidget
Copied from ScrollableTextWidget and modified so the setMessage(String) method actually works. Additionally added the setMaxScrollY() method to scroll to the bottom of the chat.
